SLMP.​SlmpStruct
public static
SLMP.​SlmpStruct

Functionality related to encoding/decoding struct.

Functions
GetStructSize
public static int GetStructSize(
Type structType
)

This function returns the size of the struct in terms of device words. (16 bit values) Int16, UInt16, Boolean size: 1 word (2 bytes) Int32, UInt32 size: 2 word (4 bytes) String, user defined size, see `SlmpStringAttribute`

Parameter
structType
Type

Type of the structure.

FromWords
public static object? FromWords(
Type structType,
ushort[] words
)

This function builds a `Type` structure from a given byte array.

Parameters
structType
Type

Type of the target structure.

words
ushort[]

Structure data in the form of an `ushort` array.
